00020 #include <pthread.h>
00021 #include <signal.h>
00022 
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 #include <string>
00025 
00026 #include "shared_memory_mutex.hpp"
00027 
00028 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00029 {
00030   try {
00031     cuda_mutex::get();
00032     std::cout << "cuda_mutex already exists" << std::endl;
00033   } catch (const std::exception& e) {
00034     sigset_t wait_mask;
00035     sigaddset(&wait_mask, SIGINT);
00036     sigaddset(&wait_mask, SIGQUIT);
00037     sigaddset(&wait_mask, SIGTERM);
00038     pthread_sigmask(SIG_BLOCK, &wait_mask, 0);
00039 
00040     shm_manager_parent s(cuda_mutex::name());
00041     
00042     std::cout << "new cuda_mutex create" << std::endl;
00043 
00044     int sig(0);
00045     sigwait(&wait_mask, &sig);
00046   }
00047   return 1;
00048 }
